      • generatek

        public static java.math.BigInteger generatek(java.math.BigInteger d,
                                             java.math.BigInteger n,
                                             javax.crypto.Mac mac,
                                             byte[] message)
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Generate k according to rfc6979.
        Parameters:
        d - D value of private key
        n - order of the DSA generator used in the signature
        mac - mac algorithm
        message - message data
        Returns:
        generated k
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Fail to generate k
        See Also:
        rfc6979 section-3.2

      • bits2int

        public static java.math.BigInteger bits2int(byte[] hash,
                                            int nbitslen)
        Converts a hash value to an integer.
        Parameters:
        hash - input hash
        nbitslen - bit length of subgroup order n of the base point
        Returns:
        converted integer
        See Also:
        rfc6979 section-2.3.2

      • int2octets

        public static byte[] int2octets(java.math.BigInteger v,
                                int rolen)
        Convert integer to octet string.
        Parameters:
        v - integer value
        rolen - (qlen + 7) / 8 where qlen = n.bitLength, byte length of n
        Returns:
        converted octec string
        See Also:
        rfc6979 section-2.3.3

      • bits2octets

        public static byte[] bits2octets(byte[] in,
                                 java.math.BigInteger n,
                                 int rolen)
        Convert bit string to octet string.
        Parameters:
        in - input bits
        n - subgroup order of the base point
        rolen - (qlen + 7) / 8 where qlen = n.bigLength, byte length of n
        Returns:
        octet string
        See Also:
        rfc6979 section-2.3.4

        Parameters:

        b - second array
        Returns:
        a concated array
